name: Trial By Fire (CorgiRam)
description:
Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
Left Click - Attack
Right Click - Splash Water (Extinguish fire adjacent to you)

Trial by Fire is a game created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 42 Jam, with the theme "running out of space."

This is meant to be played in browser, but if you are having problems you can try downloading the game.
